LanguageData.NGET_CorpseTypeEnabledTooltip: Is the corpse type enabled for processing inside the extractor type?
LanguageData.NGET_WorkHoursTooltip: The amount of in-game hours it should take to extract one genepack from this type of corpse
LanguageData.NGET_CostNeutroamineTooltip: The amount of neutroamine it should cost to extract one genepack from this type of corpse
